entry.title: Re 8/9 Will The Merge solve the high gas fees problem? ⛽ Unfortunately not ☹️ It will not have any impact on the current user experience on Ethereu...
entry.summary: Re 8/9 Will The Merge solve the high gas fees problem? ⛽ Unfortunately not ☹️ It will not have any impact on the current user experience on Ethereum, but future updates on Ethereum’s roadmap such as #sharding will help solve that issue

entry.title: Re 7/9 Bitcoin vs Ethereum’s halvening 💭 📋Bitcoin: Halves its insurance rate every 4 years 📋Ethereum: Insurance rate will reduce 90% at the ...
entry.summary: Re 7/9 Bitcoin vs Ethereum’s halvening 💭 📋Bitcoin: Halves its insurance rate every 4 years 📋Ethereum: Insurance rate will reduce 90% at the time of The Merge The Merge is equivalent to 3 #Bitcoin halvenings happening at once

entry.title: Re 6/9 What is “Triple Halvening”? It is the large drop in ETH insurance that will occur once The Merge is fully upgraded and the shift from PoW to ...
entry.summary: Re 6/9 What is “Triple Halvening”? It is the large drop in ETH insurance that will occur once The Merge is fully upgraded and the shift from PoW to PoS consensus algorithm has been fully made

entry.title: Re 5/9 You do not need 32 ETH to run a validator on the Ethereum network 🙌 Services like @Rocket_Pool allows someone with 17.6 ETH+ to be matched w...
entry.summary: Re 5/9 You do not need 32 ETH to run a validator on the Ethereum network 🙌 Services like @Rocket_Pool allows someone with 17.6 ETH+ to be matched with 16 ETH deposited to the Rocket Pool smart contract by other stakers Let us know if you’d like us to go more in-depth on this 🧠

entry.title: Re 4/9 🔄 How will this impact you? If you are a regular user of Ethereum, nothing will change All the $ETH currently on Ethereum’s network will be...
entry.summary: Re 4/9 🔄 How will this impact you? If you are a regular user of Ethereum, nothing will change All the $ETH currently on Ethereum’s network will be unaffected by the switch from PoW to PoS once The Merge occurs The Merge will only affect the consensus layer of the network

entry.title: Re 3/9 Do you know the difference between PoW and PoS? Head over to this other thread we made to learn more 👇
entry.summary: Re 3/9 Do you know the difference between PoW and PoS? Head over to this other thread we made to learn more 👇 DeFi Pulse 🍇: Proof of Work vs Proof of Stake 🥊 Do you know what they are and the differences between them? A 🧵

entry.title: Re 2/9 What is The Merge? 🤔 It is an upgrade in #Ethereum’s network that aims to replace the current consensus layer from Proof of Work (PoW) to a...
entry.summary: Re 2/9 What is The Merge? 🤔 It is an upgrade in #Ethereum’s network that aims to replace the current consensus layer from Proof of Work (PoW) to a more energy & capital efficient, but also more secure Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus
